attributes.action: heroin is on prescription,why aint marijuana?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why is heroin on prescription (class A) for addicts.why aint marijuana on prescription? (class C)that has never killed anyone,also cannabis cures most cancers and this plant is outlawed,what happened to the value of human life mr brown,studies have CLEARLY shown alcohol and tobacco kills thousands every year.....we petition that cannabis be on prescription for anyone with a doctors approval....pe@ce

rejection.details: There are a number of cannabis related e-petitions currently hosted on the website.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
